signUp.title: Welcome !
signUp.termsText: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type book . It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining unchanged.

company.title: Sobre a empresa
company.content:
Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of de 'Finibus Bonorum et Malorum' (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..', comes from a line in section 1.10.32.


The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from 'de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum' by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.

manageActives.title: Manage assets
manageActives.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this asset?

crud.title: Active
crud.name: Name
crud.tipsText:
The more details of the ad you register, the more you will be helping your potential buyer.

You can register your product and publish it later or immediately.
crud.tipsText1: Place the sale price so that the customer can buy the asset. You can view it in tokens and also in monetary value.
crud.tipsText2:
Specifications: Formats: JPG, PNG, GIF Minimum Size: 500px Maximum Size: 1200px Resolution: 72dpi Weight: up to 3mb.

For a better experience, try using a square photo as the main one.

After inserting a batch of images you can automatically generate a number of NFTs for each image uploaded.

Maximum amount of 10 images .
crud.tipsText3: You can use a group of wallets where you can add up to 10 wallets and direct different commissions for each of them.
crud.auctionProgressHint: This auction is in progress, you cannot edit it.
crud.photoAspectRatioWarning: Your main photo is not within the ideal (square) format. It will display exactly as in the preview above.

managePackages.title: Manage packages
managePackages.name: Name
managePackages.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this asset?

crud.title: Package
crud.name: Name
crud.tipsText:
Create NFT packages and define the number of NFTs you want to be included in this package.

It is possible to choose which types of NFT should be included in each package.

NFTs are randomly selected according to the items available in the selected category.
crud.tipsText1: Enter the sale price so that the customer can make the purchase. It is possible to view it in monetary value and select which currencies the customer can pay in, as well as divide the percentage for each currency.
crud.tipsText2:
Specifications: Formats: JPG, PNG, GIF Minimum Size: 500px Maximum Size: 1200px Resolution: 72dpi Weight: up to 3mb.

For a better experience, try to use a square photo as main.
crud.tipsText3: You can use a wallet group where you can add up to 10 wallets and set different commissions for each of them.
